Package org.odk.collect.android.widgets

Interface Summary
IBinaryWidget Interface implemented by widgets that need binary data.
IQuestionWidget QuestionWidgets are the main elements in QuestionView.
 

Class Summary
AudioWidget Widget that allows user to take pictures, sounds or video and add them to the form.
BarcodeWidget Widget that allows user to scan barcodes and add them to the form.
DateWidget Displays a DatePicker widget.
DecimalWidget A widget that restricts values to floating point numbers.
GeoPointWidget GeoPointWidget is the widget that allows the user to get GPS readings.
ImageWidget Widget that allows user to take pictures, sounds or video and add them to the form.
IntegerWidget Widget that restricts values to integers.
SelectMultiWidget SelctMultiWidget handles multiple selection fields using checkboxes.
SelectOneWidget SelectOneWidgets handles select-one fields using radio buttons.
StringWidget The most basic widget that allows for entry of any text.
TimeWidget  
TriggerWidget Widget that allows user to scan barcodes and add them to the form.
VideoWidget Video Widget that allows user to take pictures, sounds or video and add them to the form.
WidgetFactory Convenience class that handles creation of widgets.
